alert.note: Alert for Lincoln County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 11:59AM PST until January 15 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SATURDAY TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Wet snow expected above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Lincoln County north of Pioche. * WHEN...From 4 PM Saturday to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Accumulating snow is expected on US 93 with dangerous winter road conditions possible.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
